entries.vulnerability_reset_not_alive: You appear to be either incapacitated or dead. Aborting structure shutdown.
entries.vulnerability_reset_no_longer_in_structu: You don't appear to be in the structure any longer. Aborting structure shutdown.
entries.vulnerability_reset_request_received: Structure shutdown request received. Please stand by while the command is processed. Remain with the terminal.
entries.vulnerability_reset_wrong_cell: You don't appear to be in the same cell you were in when you requested the facility shutdown. You need to be, in order to successfully shut down the facility. Aborting Facility Shutdown.
entries.vulnerability_reset_blackout_period: The vulnerability for this structure cannot be reset between the hours of 2 and 6pm PST.
entries.in_use: This turret control terminal is already in use.
entries.already_attacking: Your selected target is already being attacked by this turret.
entries.no_line_of_site: The turret does not have line of site with that target and is unable to attack it.
entries.no_targets: This turret has no valid targets.
entries.invalid_target: That target has become unavailable. Please refresh terminal for latest target information.
entries.declared_only: Only Special Forces personnel may access this terminal!
entries.none_active: There are no available turrets to control using this terminal.
entries.admin_only: You must be at least faction rank 4 to use this terminal.
entries.under_attack: You cannot add defenses while this HQ is under attack. This function will be restored in %TO.
entries.vulnerability_reset: The vulnerability for this structure has been reset.
entries.prose_disable_other: You must first disable the %TU before you can affect this %TT.
entries.terminal_disabled: This terminal has been disabled. Repair the objectives to reactivate.
